Hydras/Perceptor:

"Peceptor" hissed Hydras

Perceptor whose know what Hydr=
as whant went to wards the unconceus 
femme and with one of his device jamm=
ed Nightlight commlink, just in 
time 'cause the femme was starting to awak=
e.

"It seems that the sleepy beaty is awakening"hissed Hydras "Long time 
=
without pay a visit, Nighlight, no since you was reprogramed as 
predacon w=
ith the name "Blackstorm"... Dont let her run away!!!"

Nightlight tried to=
 understood what had happened while she was sat 
down in the floor, first s=
he saw the puppet, the helmet and then to 
Jhiaxus

"YOU!"Said shocked the =
femme"It was you!"
